title: PI Binks: The Case of the Missing B-I-N-G-O
description: The world famous, Private Investigator Binks and his faithful sidekick P Teds are off on their first great adventure as they try to find the missing pieces of BINGO to put their dog back together. Through this mystery, they run across the wolf on his way to Red Riding Hood's Granny's cottage, stumble upon Frankenstein castle, encounter Humpty Dumpty before finding themselves at Old McDonald's Farm. So join Binks on a ridiculous adventure full of hilarity and hijacks that both kids and parents can enjoy with full color pictures.
author: Andrew Augustine
